name: YesorNo
0:
”Alexa, open Yes or No”
”Alexa, open Yes or No and give me a decision”
”Alexa, open Yes or No and choose”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yes or no
des: If you're in need of a decision, just ask Alexa to make one for you. It will choose a decision for you, just have a yes or no question in mind already before you ask.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
